data.eml:eml: Re-description of two atypical species of Pungentus Thorne & Swanger, 1936, with proposal of Stenodorylaimus gen. n. (Nematoda, Dorylaimida, Nordiidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Álvarez-Ortega, Sergio, Peña-Santiago, Reyes (2011): Re-description of two atypical species of Pungentus Thorne & Swanger, 1936, with proposal of Stenodorylaimus gen. n. (Nematoda, Dorylaimida, Nordiidae). Zootaxa 2799: 49-62, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.203129
